column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#id=1
#text=My husband and I are huge health junkies .
#id=2
#text=We ride our bikes to and from work everyday .
#id=3
#text=Yes , we own a car but we love getting that extra thirty minute workout everyday .
#id=4
#text=Last week , I rode over a piece of cracked glass from a bottle .
#id=5
#text=The tire on my bike slowly began to deflate .
#id=6
#text=I called my husband to come get me and we took the bike home to get fixed .
#id=7
#text=I washed it with soapy water to see where the hole was .
#id=8
#text=I got out my air pump and began to pump .
#id=9
#text=The part where there was a hole blew out air around the wet wheel .
#text=I got a bike patch and just stuff it on over the spot once the wheel had dried .
#text=Put some more air into the tire and test drove it around the street and back .
#text=My sweet bicycle was back and even better than ever .
